mapper.select: select menu_id, admin_id, menu_category_id, menu_code, menu_name, menu_price, recommend_menu, menu_state, menu_img_url from menu_tb where admin_id = #{adminId} and menu_category_id = #{menuCategoryId}

select ont.admin_id, ont.menu_id, ott.option_title_id, ott.title_name, ont.option_name_id, ont.option_name, ont.option_price from option_name_tb ont left outer join option_title_tb ott on(ott.option_title_id = ont.option_title_id) where ont.admin_id = #{adminId} and ont.menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: insert into menu_tb values (0, #{adminId}, #{menuCategoryId}, #{menuCode}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{recommendMenu}, #{menuState}, #{menuImgUrl}, now(), now())
insert into menu_category_tb values (0, #{adminId}, #{menuCategoryName}, now(), now())
insert into option_title_tb values (0, #{adminId}, #{menuId}, #{titleName}, now(), now())
insert into option_name_tb values (0, #{adminId}, #{menuId}, #{titleId}, #{optionName}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update menu_category_tb set menu_category_name = #{menuCategoryName}, update_date = now() where menu_category_id = #{menuCategoryId} and admin_id = #{adminId}

update menu_tb set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_price = #{menuPrice}, recommend_menu = #{recommendMenu}, menu_state = #{menuState}, menu_img_url = #{menuImgUrl}, menu_category_id = #{menuCategoryId}, update_date = now() where menu_id = #{menuId} and admin_id = #{adminId}
